1.content:
"Why can't all days in the Spring be like this?" you asked yourself.

Winter had released its icy grip on the world and Spring had finally come. To you, it came a lot quicker than predicted. The sky was blue and cloudless, the grass was becoming more green by the minute, the breeze was cool and refreshing, and the first birds to arrive were singing. As you traveled down the path, you beheld this serene atmosphere and exhaled your breath in satisfaction. True, your large pack of supplies was a constant strain on your back, but Mother Nature's beauty was more than enough to make you forget the weight you carried. With a smile on your face and a lively stride, you continued down the road. What lay beyond was vague and uncertain, for no one can truly predict what can happen.

This speculation of your rang true that day. As you continued your trek down the path, you heard what you first thought to be a cry for help. Ever the curious one, you picked up the pace and followed the noise. The close you got to the noise, the more clear it became. The sound was indeed someone in distress; and as you got closer, the voice also sounded... feminine. It came from a nearby grove. In the shade of the trees, you searched for the lady. Fortunately, you did not have to look very far. You would have overlooked a certain area had her voice not called out again. Your eyes quickly shot towards the direction of her voice and there she was, or at least, part of her. Evidently, the lady who cried for help was trapped in a hole and only her lower legs were visible. Becoming more desperate to get out, she started kicking her legs - not that it helped much.

Upon seeing her kicking feet, you said the first thing that came to your mind, "Are you alright, miss - oh yeah - apart from being stuck?"

Her kicking ceased. "Oh, am I ever glad you came. Please, help me out of here," she appreciatively and anxiously replied.

Since the only part of her you could see was her feet, your attention was fixed on them the entire time. Peering at them long enough, you began to think about them. No, she needs your help. There was no time to be thinking about your tickle fetish or her feet. You shrugged that thought from your mind and and snapped back to reality.

"Excuse me," you asked, "but would you mind telling me your name?"

Though you couldn't see her face, you could tell she was a little confused at your question. You began to think that it probably wasn't the brightest thing to ask in this situation. Regardless, it seemed the girl remembered her predicament and decided to answer you.

"My name is... "
1.title: A beautiful day and an unexpected meeting

So you decided to do it a little differently this time.You grabbed her legs a little above the ankles, and started pulling a bit. Kagome however was still stuck in the hole. You suspected you could pull her out if you tried to use your full strength, but if you did that, occasion to have fun with cute girl's feet would just pass you by, and you didn't wanted to let that happen!
"You know, I think it would be easier if I took your socks off... My hands keep trying to slide with them still on."You said
"Why is that? Can't you just grab a bit higher on my legs?"Said Kagome
"If I grabbed you there I'm pretty sure I would be able to see your panties under that skirt..."You said
Kagome was quiet for a while, then finally replied.
"Okay, take my socks off and try to pull again."She said
"Just as planned" You thought with victorious grin on your face
Without waiting much you proceeded to take off on of Kagome's socks. You started sliding it off revealing more of her slender leg, finally reaching her cute foot. In a moment Kagome's cute bare foot was out to the air. Her sole was really smooth and seemed soft, and she had most adorable toes you ever saw in your life. You stopped yourself from admiring anymore, not wanting Kagome to suspect anything, and quickly took off her other sock, revealing her equally pretty other foot.
What to do now?

15533222222222222222221.content:
A few minutes ago... "I wont fail again. I swear!" Medusa only looks on at Eruka coldly.
"Fine. I'll let you live, but... Snake, Snake, Cobra, Cobra..." Eruka looks at Medusa with a terrified look as she slowly backs away. Medusa simply smirks as Eruka looks over her body.
"Um..." Eruka gives Medusa a questioning glance.
"I disabled your ability to transform into a frog, as well as your tadpole bombs. Good luck freeing yourself!" Medusa snaps her fingers and a vector plate appears under Eruka, sending her straight into the ground, with her legs swinging wildly as she tries to free herself... Que traveler.

It's always something in this town. Witches, Meisters, Deathscythes, never a quiet day. As you're walking along, you hear quiet sobbing. You follow the source of the noise and find a woman with her upper half buried in the ground.
"Excuse me Miss?"
"Oh thank goodness! Could you help me out of here? Someone might ambush me while I'm like this! Ribbit." She says frantically.
"How do you know that I'm not one of those people? Someone could really take advantage of you while you were like this... Especially if that someone had a foot fetish..." You say as your perverted nature begins to get the better of you.
"Look. You can do whatever you want with my feet. Just promise me that you'll try to pull me out of here when you're done. Ok?" She seems pretty serious.
"What. Really? How do I know that you wont tell someone or try to hurt me if you ever do get out?" You ask her.
"I hate to say this but... You'll just have to trust me on this one. There are people out there that you should be afraid of, I'm not one of them." She says as uses her feet to pull her boots of. Her now stocking clad feet seem to call to you as she flexes her toes. "And you know... I could reward you if you help me out." She says as she rubs her feet together. "But by all means have your fun. We've got plenty of time"
"Well. I feel that it's now my duty to free you..." You walk over to her and get a closer look at her feet, they're quite well taken care of. "...but your feet are so pretty, and you did say that I could have some fun first." You slowly lower your face into her waiting soles, they're a bit sweaty but the smell is tolerable, you've always kinda liked the smell of women's feet anyway. This is like pure bliss for you, to have your face buried into a girl's soles... Thinking about it, you never even asked her for her name. "How rude of me. May I ask what your name is?"
"Oh. It's Eruka. Eruka Frog."
"That's a peculiar last name."
"Well... That's cause I'm a witch. And witches around here are generally named for their powers. As you can guess, mine are frog based. Unfortunately another witch sealed my powers and I've been stuck here ever since." She says with a tinge of sadness in her voice.
"That settles it, I'm gonna pull you out right now." You say as you grab her ankles.
"Hey um... Thanks..."
"Well you cant exactly get yourself out now can you?"
You begin to pull, you begin to feel something move... it starts to move faster and faster until you go flying out with it. You sit up only to see a pair of stockings in your hand. Eruka tries to use her legs to close her dress shut.
"Um... one more time but... Please dont look at my panties! Ribbit." She says embarrassed.
"Dont worry, I wont." You assure her. Again grabbing her ankles, you begin to pull. "When this is over, will you still let me play with your feet?" You ask.
"Sure. Truth be told I was enjoying it when you were snuggling my feet earlier."
You give her one big pull and...

choices: Keep trying to get her out of the hole.
Give into temptation and remove her shoes.
15533222222222222222222221.content:
This revelation was quite the surprise. Here, stuck in this hole, was the Kim Possible. No other teenage hero was as well known as her; Kim was brave, intelligent, charming, reliable, attractive (let's not deny it) and, as she would often say, she could do anything. You had been wanting to meet her in person for a long time, but no situation you've ever been in warranted help from her. But surprise surprise! She seemed to be the one in trouble, and it became apparent that you were the only one around to help her. Still, it wasn't how you imagined your first meeting with the redheaded action girl.

You decided to question her again, for your curiosity still had a hold on you. "Excuse me, Ms. Possible," you began awkwardly. "How exactly did you get into this 'sitch'?" Despite your idol's predicament, you couldn't resist using one of her "Kim-isms".

"Well, it's kinda embarrassing but... I was on a solo mission to recover a piece of stolen technology from Professor Dementor and I dropped it by accident while I was trying to escape. I couldn't just leave it in this hole after all that trouble, so...." You could tell Kim's trailing off to end her story was deliberate, but the scene pretty much spoke for itself.

"It's okay, Ms. Possible - "

"Call me Kim," she interjected. "Formalities aren't a concern to me at this point."

You smiled. Kim Possible was even more easy-going than you thought. "Very well, Kim Possible. I'm going to try pulling you out." With both hands around Kim's ankles, you began to tug slowly and gently.

After a few minutes of pulling Kim's legs, it became clear that you were both getting nowhere fast. You were going to have to come up with a different plan or go get help. But just as you were about to let go of her ankles, something intriguing caught your eye. Underneath her pant cuffs, you noticed that she wasn't wearing any socks. At that moment, the sight of her bare ankles sparked your secret foot fetish and you wanted to see the rest of her feet. Plus, they were the feet of your beloved hero - talk about a bonus!

However, if you acted upon your own foot fetish without Kim's permission, then she will probably have a different opinion of you altogether and it wouldn't be a good opinion at that. It would probably be better to just help her out of the hole and leave such lustful ideas in the back of your mind. She might even offer you a reward for helping her out. Who knows?

Kim's voice interrupted your thoughts. "Is everything alright up there? You've stopped pulling."

"Oh, don't worry about me," you answered. "Just collecting my wits. No big." An audible groan from inside the hole followed your last remark.

At that moment, you had decided to...
15533222222222222222222221.title: What's the sitch?

info.brief_description: A lady is stuck in the hole with her feet sticking out; need I say more?
info.description:
Imagine a traveller (that's you) going down a path and come across a woman in a pickle. She's hopelessly stuck and only her feet are showing. What will happen? Will you do the right thing and help her out or will your mischievous side win out and have fun at the expense of your "damsel"?

Breakdown:

-No sex/nudity
-Use as little profanity as possible for this story
-No M/M "action"
-When starting the story of a character, use the first chapter to tell how she came to be stuck in a hole in the ground/rubble/etc. (if she's a magical/strong character, explain why she can't get out). You don't have to do it right away, but at some point, it should be mentioned
-Story must be told from 2nd person perspective i.e "You tickle Aerith's toes"
-Don't write anything that reveals the traveller's gender (your gender). I'd like to make this so that it really does feel like you're in the scenario
-It can be about any fictional female character you wish
-Be as kind (foot worship/massage, rescuing) or as cruel as you like (by cruel, I mean tease, tickle, or inflict light pain; yes, pain is allowed, but keep it as light as possible like a playful slap on the foot or a little pin prick or something)
-Last, but not least, no short chapters; I cannot stress that enough. Abrupt endings will be deleted

That's it. Go crazy, people!
